title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.2 - Acceptable meters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.2 - Acceptable meters

State Regulations

Only types of meters which have been approved by the
commission shall be used for the purposes of customer billing. The commission
may approve or reject a type of meter or metering system on the basis of tests
required by these rules or such tests as the commission staff may
direct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
93.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
